question: I am certain that while having intercourse with my boyfriend that we fractured his penis.  The entire shaft of his penis bruised shortly after and since then he has had a difficult time getting erections (which was never a problem before).  I did not know at the time that this was possible.  The other day he showed me that he has a hard nodule on the shaft of his penis near the site of injury.  I am assuming this to be scar tissue which is affecting his ability to get erections. He has made an appointment to see a MD, but I am anxious to know what other treatment options are available to correct his erectile dysfunction since he did not go the the ER and surgery was not performed.  Will a medication like Viagra work since the problem seems to be structural (because of the scar tissue)?  Or will he have to get surgery?  If he does have to have surgery what are the chances that it will correct the impotence?  Thanks.
title: Penis Fracture
